Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan has a 13-8 win-loss record in T20Is.
Pakistan was defeated 3-0 by Sri Lanka in their most recent T20I series.
Both teams have won their most recent games while batting second, so we predict that if either side wins the toss, the captain will elect to field first.
The wicket in Dubai has become quicker and simpler to bat on, with a par score of between 170-180 expected.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan is the favourite to win this match.
Sri Lanka will enter this encounter as the underdog, despite having won the last three games in this format and playing more convincingly in their most recent game.
We anticipate a high-scoring contest, with Pakistan taking home the victory.
